## ApiNamespaceAria2.tellActive() method

This method returns a list of active downloads. The response is an array of the same structs as returned by the `aria2.tellStatus()` method.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tellActive<T extends keyof Status>(keys?: T[]): Promise<Array<Pick<Status, T>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keys | T\[\] | response contains these keys only |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Array&lt;Pick&lt;[Status](./aria2.status.md)<!-- -->, T&gt;&gt;&gt;

array
